name: Sanjoy Kumar
title: CEO & Lead Designer
bio: Creative professional with 8+ years of experience in brand identity, visual communication, and promotional design. NSDA Level-3 certified in Graphic Design for Freelancing, with a strong background in remote work and design mentoring. Has completed 3700+ global projects, blending strategy and aesthetics to build impactful brands.
